sentences.en: Opposition leaders had called for a boycott of the vote.
sentences.cn: 反对派领导者号召联合抵制投票。

sentences.en: We are asking people to boycott goods from companies that use child labour.
sentences.cn: 我们正呼吁大家抵制雇用童工的公司的产品。

sentences.en: A spokesman says the president has backed off from his threat to boycott the conference.
sentences.cn: 一位发言人说，总统已经撤回了他抵制这次会谈的威胁。
